title: The Enlightened Adventures of Walter Moore
summary: Walter Moore, a 40-year-old lecturer, discovers an ancient artifact which grants him the power to manipulate time, leading him to become a superhero who guides and protects his city over the course of a week.
summaryGerman: Walter Moore, ein 40-jähriger Dozent, entdeckt ein antikes Artefakt, das ihm die Macht verleiht, die Zeit zu manipulieren, wodurch er zum Superhelden wird, der seine Stadt im Laufe einer Woche führt und schützt.
summaryDutch: Walter Moore, een 40-jarige lector, ontdekt een oud artefact dat hem de kracht geeft om tijd te manipuleren, waardoor hij een superheld wordt die zijn stad gedurende een week begeleidt en beschermt.
summaryFrench: Walter Moore, un conférencier de 40 ans, découvre un artefact ancien qui lui donne le pouvoir de manipuler le temps, le conduisant à devenir un super-héros qui guide et protège sa ville au cours d'une semaine.

story.text: Walter Moore discovers an ancient timepiece buried in the archives during a school renovation. It hums with a strange energy.
He experiments with the timepiece after class and inadvertently stops time for a moment. Excitement and fear grip him.
Walter resumes time but realizes he can also fast-forward it. He prevents an accident by fast-forwarding a car past a crossing pedestrian.
Walter, feeling the responsibility of his powers, spends the day rescuing people in peril by manipulating minor moments in time.
Word begins to spread of a guardian 'Timekeeper'. Walter balances his lecturer duties while secretly using his powers.
Walter faces a dilemma when a villain learns of his power and tries to steal the timepiece. A fierce battle ensues.
After defeating the villain, Walter decides to entrust the timepiece to a secret society for safekeeping.

ending: By choosing the safety of all over personal power, Walter truly became the hero he was meant to be.
moral: With great power comes great responsibility.
